class.name: LineShape2D
class.description: Line shape for 2D collisions. It works like a 2D plane and will not allow any body to go to the negative side. Not recommended for rigid bodies, and usually not recommended for static bodies either because it forces checks against it on every frame.

method.name: get_d
method.description: Return the line distance from the origin.

method.name: set_d
method.description: Set the line distance from the origin.

members.member: The line's distance from the origin.
